synopsis.text:
Ruma pirates beware! The once unluckiest man in the universe, Seina Yamada, is now your worst nightmare. After a case of mistaken identity lands him in the Galaxy Police force, Seina's life takes a drastic turn. His bad luck, which once brought calamity to everyone around him, now serves as a pirate magnet, making him an invaluable asset to the GXP.

Surrounded by a crew of four captivating women, each with their own unique charm and strength, Seina's luck seems to take a turn for the better. Amane Kaunaq, a former model turned GP detective, Kiriko Masaki, Seina's long-time friend, Ryoko Balta, a former pirate named after a legend, and Neju Na Melmas, a powerful 2000-year-old priestess, all vie for Seina's affection.

Armed with a ship cloned from the legendary Ryo-Oh-Ki, Seina and his crew navigate the cosmos, defeating pirates and capturing hearts. As Seina's luck continues to change, one question remains: will he capture the heart of one of his crew members, or will they capture his? Join Seina on his journey from an unlucky Earth boy to a feared Galaxy Police Officer in this thrilling and romantic anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
